hero-about-me: I am a recent Computer Science graduate from the University of Canterbury, with strong programming fundamentals and hands-on experience gained through academic coursework and personal projects.
hero-about-me-second: I am currently working on two separate projects: a full-stack website for a Chinese tutoring business and a WeChat mini game. I am eager to enter the real-world software development industry, continue learning new technologie, and contribute to building digital products that create meaningful value for the community and society.
hobbit: In my spare time, I enjoy photography and capturing wonderful moments in life through my lens. Everyone's memories are unique, and I hope to preserve these beautiful and authentic memories through photos and share them with others.
